articles.title: Russell Brand posts video denying 'serious criminal allegations' - BBC
articles.description: The BBC understands that a number of women will make serious allegations about Brand's sexual conduct.
articles.content:
Russell Brand has released a video in which he denies "serious criminal allegations" that he says will be made against him.
